name: CCK.Debugger
author: kafeijao
description:
The Content Creation Debugger allows you to debug `avatars`, `props` and `misc`.

__**Menu**__ - Menu that displays useful information like:
- Avatar and Props `synced`/`local` parameter values
- Prop Pickups and Attach Info
- Avatar & Props Pointers/Triggers detailed info
- Avatar animator layer playing clips

__**Visualizers**__ - Toggleable Component visualizers:
- Pointers and Triggers 3D shape
- Trigger `OnEnter` (green), `OnExit` (red), `OnStay` (yellow) events
- IK bones
- FBT Trackers

Supports [BTKUILib](https://api.cvrmg.com/v1/mods/download/113) to restore the menu position or completely hide it.

Click [here](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/CCK.Debugger) for a more **in-depth** readme (with pictures).
